name: Technology Partners
tag_list: recruiting, staffing, placement, staff, augmentation, consulting
overview: Technology Partners has been a leader in providing IT Solutions and resources to many Fortune 500 companies for over a decade. Their proven reputation attracts some of the best and brightest IT talent, both locally and nationally. Coupled with their unique business model, they are able to provide thier clients with top candidates at competitive salaries. They are committed to understanding the needs of their clients, identifying the appropriate resources and delivering smarter business solutions.
